title: 20.5 Perches Land with House for Sale in Ranmuthugala, Kadawatha
details:
20.5 Perches Land with House for Sale in Ranmuthugala, Kadawatha,
on 19th Km Post, close to Mahara AGA office.
Kadawatha, is a one of leading city in Gampaha district
which is a city full of developed facilities and residencies.
The land value is rapidly increasing with Southern Highway Interchange.
Complete house also available with 3 Bedrooms, 2 Bathrooms, Living, Dining Room, Garage.
Electricity and Water Board Line
Good wide road access
Very convenient location
Just 30m to Kandy road.
Selling Price: Rs.25 Million
Call for More Details: 0755104701/ 0713247845
